languages.text: {n}Ваш вдохновленный лик, точь в точь такой же, как на {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}агитационном плакате{/d}, заставляет серфов восторженно вскричать. В этот крик они вкладывают всю надежду, что раз вы превозмогли, то, может быть, смогут и они. Даже избитый бедолага пялится на вас с тупой мечтательной улыбкой.{/n}

{n}Your inspiring visage, just like the one they used for the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}propaganda poster{/d}, sends the serfs into a frenzy of rapturous cries. You hear them channelling all their hopes to overcome the odds just as you did. Even the beaten man stares at you with a wistful smile on his lips.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш вдохновленный лик, точь в точь такой же, как на {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}агитационном плакате{/d}, заставляет серфов восторженно вскричать. В этот крик они вкладывают всю надежду, что раз вы превозмогли, то, может быть, смогут и они. Даже избитый бедолага пялится на вас с тупой мечтательной улыбкой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your inspiring visage, just like they one they used for the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}propaganda poster{/d}, sends the serfs into a frenzy of rapturous cries. You can hear them channelling their hope that they might overcome the odds as you did. Even the beaten man stares at you with a wistful smile on his lips.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein inspirierendes Gesicht lässt die Sklaven ähnlich wie das {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Propagandaplakat{/d} in wilden Jubel ausbrechen. Du hörst, wie sie alle ihre Hoffnungen sammeln, um wie du alle Widrigkeiten zu überwinden. Selbst der geprügelte Mann starrt dich mit einem wehmütigen Lächeln an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your inspiring visage, just like the one they used for the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}propaganda poster{/d}, sends the serfs into a frenzy of rapturous cries. You hear them channelling all their hopes to overcome the odds just as you did. Even the beaten man stares at you with a wistful smile on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dein inspirierendes Gesicht lässt die Sklaven ähnlich wie das {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Propagandaplakat{/d} in wilden Jubel ausbrechen. Du hörst, wie sie alle ihre Hoffnungen sammeln, um wie du alle Widrigkeiten zu überwinden. Selbst der geprügelte Mann starrt dich mit einem wehmütigen Lächeln an.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre visage inspirant, identique à celui utilisé pour l'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}affiche de propagande{/d}, provoque une cacophonie de cris d'extase chez les serfs. Vous les entendez canaliser l'espoir de surmonter toutes leurs difficultés comme vous l'avez fait vous-même. Même l'homme battu vous regarde avec un sourire rêveur aux lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your inspiring visage, just like the one they used for the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}propaganda poster{/d}, sends the serfs into a frenzy of rapturous cries. You hear them channelling all their hopes to overcome the odds just as you did. Even the beaten man stares at you with a wistful smile on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre visage inspirant, identique à celui utilisé pour l'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}affiche de propagande{/d}, provoque une cacophonie de cris d'extase chez les serfs. Vous les entendez canaliser l'espoir de surmonter toutes leurs difficultés comme vous l'avez fait vous-même. Même l'homme battu vous regarde avec un sourire rêveur aux lèvres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu semblante inspirador, el mismo que se utilizó para los {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}carteles de propaganda{/d}, suscita un arrebato de gritos enfervorecidos entre los siervos. Los oyes canalizar todas sus esperanzas para sobreponerse a sus desventuras siguiendo tu ejemplo. Incluso el hombre maltrecho te mira fijamente con una sonrisa melancólica en los labios.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your inspiring visage, just like the one they used for the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}propaganda poster{/d}, sends the serfs into a frenzy of rapturous cries. You hear them channelling all their hopes to overcome the odds just as you did. Even the beaten man stares at you with a wistful smile on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu semblante inspirador, el mismo que se utilizó para los {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}carteles de propaganda{/d}, suscita un arrebato de gritos enfervorecidos entre los siervos. Los oyes canalizar todas sus esperanzas para sobreponerse a sus desventuras siguiendo tu ejemplo. Incluso el hombre maltrecho te mira fijamente con una sonrisa melancólica en los labios.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの勇ましい姿は{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}プロパガンダのポスター{/d}で使われるにふさわしいもので、農奴たちに歓喜の叫びと熱狂を起こさせる。あなたがして見せたように、彼らは困難を克服するべくすべての希望を注ぎ込む。殴られた男でさえ、唇に痛ましい笑みを浮かべてあなたを見つめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your inspiring visage, just like the one they used for the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}propaganda poster{/d}, sends the serfs into a frenzy of rapturous cries. You hear them channelling all their hopes to overcome the odds just as you did. Even the beaten man stares at you with a wistful smile on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの勇ましい姿は{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}プロパガンダのポスター{/d}で使われるにふさわしいもので、農奴たちに歓喜の叫びと熱狂を起こさせる。あなたがして見せたように、彼らは困難を克服するべくすべての希望を注ぎ込む。殴られた男でさえ、唇に痛ましい笑みを浮かべてあなたを見つめていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你鼓舞人心的面容，就像{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}宣传海报{/d}的画像一样。听了你的话之后，所有人都陷入了狂热的欣喜之中。你听到他们所有人都愿意像你一样，把所有希望寄托在克服困难上。即便是那个被殴打的工人，也一样在盯着你，嘴角挂着渴切的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your inspiring visage, just like the one they used for the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}propaganda poster{/d}, sends the serfs into a frenzy of rapturous cries. You hear them channelling all their hopes to overcome the odds just as you did. Even the beaten man stares at you with a wistful smile on his lips.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你鼓舞人心的面容，就像{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}宣传海报{/d}的画像一样。听了你的话之后，所有人都陷入了狂热的欣喜之中。你听到他们所有人都愿意像你一样，把所有希望寄托在克服困难上。即便是那个被殴打的工人，也一样在盯着你，嘴角挂着渴切的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Propaganda afişi{/d} için kullanılan fotoğraflar misali ilham veren görüntün, köleleri coşkulu feryatlarla dolu bir çılgınlığa sürüklüyor. Tıpkı senin gibi zorlukların üstesinden gelmek için tüm umutlarını haykırdıklarını duyuyorsun. Dayak yiyen adam bile dudaklarında hüzünlü bir gülümsemeyle sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your inspiring visage, just like the one they used for the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}propaganda poster{/d}, sends the serfs into a frenzy of rapturous cries. You hear them channelling all their hopes to overcome the odds just as you did. Even the beaten man stares at you with a wistful smile on his lips.{/n}
